english.segment1: Though I'm many miles away. How could I forget the day. I held you close. And my heart was changed forever
english.segment2: Though I'm many miles away. I'll forever hear you say. I am your child. Please will you love me. Won't you stay my little one
english.segment3: I live to change your world. I live to change your world. Oh how you've changed my world. Know the kindness of God. Will make a way
english.segment4: There's not a day that passes by. When I don't hear your hungry cry. I won't forget you. Oh how I love you. Just be strong my little one
english.segment5: He rejoices over you with singing. He will quite you with his love. I know you'll be dancing. When your heart is heavy. Heaven will make a way. Just hold on
english.segment6: I live to change your world. I live to change your world. Oh how you've changed my world. Oh how you've changed my world
english.segment7: And when the night is long. And hunger is your song. Breathe again and know. To hope is never wrong. Change your world
english.segment8: Oceans of mercy calling. Heaven will rain again
